title: @riot my support ticket has gone unanswered for 3 days?
body: I realize you guys get a lot of support questions. but 3 days?? isnt that a bit over the top?

replies.body: 3 days is pretty unusual.  Our volume is a bit high right now, but I'd like to check on the status of your ticket.  Let me know your ticket number and I'll see where you're at!
I received an email reply around the same time you commented. thanks though
